title: mfw mordekaiser and the enemy has a farming jungler
body:
http://i967.photobucket.com/albums/ae157/LOTRfan88_2010/The%20Personality%20in%20my%20Brain/LOTRSauron2.gif

fuck those minions i'm pushing all day

replies.body:
This is about the one single plus to {{champion:82}}  HE CAN PUSH!!!

HARD!!!

he also has really high base damages and can 1v1 almost anyone, jax can probably kill him because well, he's jax, but anyone foolish enough to get in his range is going down unless their damage is nuts...vayne, why

gnar, riven(skill matchup), vladimir, teemo, any top laner, any midlaner assassin
The thing about morde is he is a skill champion, you need to balance yourself or you kill yourself.
or build bruiserkaiser and stand on top of the enemy team and laugh at them

this right here is the reason Morde was the first champ I ever actually bought. Teammates will be moaning at me to group mid and i'm just like NOPE. Go 0-4 in laning phase? Screw it, just push. 5-0 in the first 2 minutes? Push baby. Enemy trying to take your Nexus. PUSH THAT LANE LIKE YOUR LIFE DEPENDED ON IT.

And you thought Nasus was Farming Simulator 2015... wait till they feel the fury of my pizza feet up their buttholes.
He's pushing the minions so hard that they were sent flying.
5 wins in a row with {{champion:82}} I don't think he needs a rework. xD
